title: 10 Everyday Items That Used to Cost 25 Cents—Now They’re Shockingly Expensive
description: Remember when a quarter could buy you a pack of gum, a magazine, or even a bus ride? Fast-forward to today, and those same everyday...
author: Amanda Blankenship
excerpt: These 10 everyday items that once cost just 25 cents now cost several dollars—see what’s driving the change and ways to save smart.
